quotes.quote: Willpower is steam for life's locomotion.
The forthputting of willpower is a means of strengthening willpower. The will becomes strong by exercise. To stick to a thing till you are master is a test of intellectual discipline and power.
A willing spirit, a determined effort.
For a great willpower, no road has length!
It's just a matter of willpower. The day you decide it's over, it's over. You never get over it.
In todays world, you need to have courage and strong willpower to make things happen.
Most of life's actions are within our reach, but decisions take willpower.
You must be willing, determined and persistent to achieve your goals.
The concept of fate is an open insult against man's willpower!
Willpower is nothing but willingness to do.
Willpower is the key to success. Successful people strive no matter what they feel by applying their will to overcome apathy, doubt or fear.
Willpower is the shortest shortcut to success.
There is no such thing as a great talent without great will power.
Will power is to the mind like a strong blind man who carries on his shoulders a lame man who can see.
It's amazing how willpower can build walls.
Willpower is essential to the accomplishment of anything worthwhile.
Will and intellect are one and the same.
People do not lack strength; they lack will.
In the absence of willpower the most complete collection of virtues and talents is wholly worthless.
Freedom is will-power to define my path.
A man can do all things if he but wills them.
Next to courage, willpower is the most important thing in politics.
If freedom is short of weapons, we must compensate with willpower.
The will is your most important asset. If you lose it, you have lost everything.
I have discovered in life that there are ways of getting almost anywhere you want to go, if you really want to go.
You don't find will power, you create it.
Our tendency is to be strong, self-sufficient, and dependent on our own willpower, but rather than try harder, we should reach out to the God who is all powerful.
Once you reach the brink of your will power, you have two options either give up, or keep going. That decision decides whether you'll reach your goal.
Willpower isn't just a skill. It's a muscle, like the muscles in your arms or legs, and it gets tired as it works harder, so there's less power left over for other things.
When people have a willpower failure, it's because they haven't anticipated a situation that's going to come along.
